#!/bin/bash

# Create output file
OUTPUT_FILE="./fedora-packages.txt"

echo "Exporting installed packages to $OUTPUT_FILE..."

# Export header
echo "# Fedora packages installed on $(date)" > "$OUTPUT_FILE"
echo "# Generated by Furnace" >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
echo "" >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"

# Export user-installed packages
echo "# User-installed packages" >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
dnf list installed | grep -v "@" | awk '{print $1}' | sort >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"

echo "Package list exported successfully to $OUTPUT_FILE"
